thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: ANGELINA

author: ANGELINA
title: ANGELINA
text:
I am glad I came across Kiwi Sheepskins earlier this year. So far I've got two shipments. In the future there will be more.
We love our new sheepskin slippers, and my cats fight for the pet rug they've got! I ordered the least expensive slippers, and my son and I are very happy with them. We both like to have a little room on the inside when wearing slippers, and ordered slightly bigger sizes. Perfect. I recommend Kiwi products to anyone who lives in cooler climates.
The delivery is super fast too.
Thanks again, Kiwi.
